name: Beleberda 4
description:
Rather, grab your weapon and set off to destroy the crowds of enemies who want to take over the planet. The enemy is waiting on every corner and is ready to attack suddenly. Invasion or unsuccessful experiment of scientists? The planet is in danger! Rather, grab a weapon and set off to destroy crowds of enemies who want to take over the planet. Impassable crowds of enemies are waiting on every corner and are always ready to strike, but a desperate attempt to save the planet can sometimes take a decisive step. Wipe the snot and go to battle!
Look for weapons, armor and health that will help you go through waves of enemies and defeat bosses in the decisive battle for the planet. The fate of this world is in your hands!

Game Features:

  • Steam Cloud - With Steam Cloud your profile is stored on the Cloud servers.
  • Steam Statistics - View your stats to see how many are completed: headshots, killings, deaths, and more.
  • Steam Leaderboards - Compete with players around the world to get into the top 100.
  • Complexity - Immerse yourself in hardcore, early 2000s and experience all the difficulties, going through many waves of enemies.
  • Secrets - In each location, secret rooms, small destructible items from which you can knock out something useful and much more are stored.
  • Unexpected fights - Keep your finger on the trigger! Monsters can spawn from anywhere.
